item.description:
Member and mechanic Jim Tasse will introduce you to your bike, and common adjustments that you may need to make to it.

Jim is the director of Healthy Casco Bay (www.healthycascobay.org) a Healthy Maine Partnership serving the Greater Portland area. He is a bicycle advocate and safety instructor, a League of American Bicyclist "League Cycling Instructor"and a former shop tech, tour guide and tour guide trainer.


This Tech Seminar will Cover:

1. Quick overall bike condition assessment and problem identification (Checking headset, BB, wheels true, hubs, brakes, derailleur hanger, visual inspection of chain)
2. Basic fit considerations.
3. The basic home toolkit
4. How to fix a flat
5. How to adjust shifting and brakes
5. Q and A--What do YOU want to know? What problems does your bike have?
item.how_to_find_us: Will be wearing a Healthy Casco Bay T-shirt
item.name: Basic Bicycle Mechanics Workshop
